title: Request Accessible Textbook Format
description: A student with a visual impairment needs an accessible electronic version (e.g., PDF, EPUB) of a required textbook.

tasks.description: Identify the student and verify their accommodation for accessible course materials.
Collect the textbook information (title, ISBN) and proof of purchase from the student.
Request the accessible format from the publisher or an accessibility clearinghouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits a formal request to the appropriate source for the accessible file.
